name: Hydroshi: Through the Reservoir
description:
Be warned that this game has yet to be finished, so player will have limited mechanics and tiles might look half assed. This DEMO will give a grasp on what the game will look like.

After sending Baby Mario and Baby Luigi back home, he was living his life until conflict ensues. Boom! Original Plotline!

Controls: Z to skip dialogue and the game will tell you the rest of the controls.


What you must report:
-Bugs
